about_the_game:
Everpixel Tactics Demo

Everpixel Tactics is a turn-based, tactical, roguelike RPG set in a dynamic, procedurally-generated fantasy world. Lead a motley crew of mercenaries to greatness - or die trying. Hire samurai penguins, obese unicorns, or spell-flinging mages as you manage your company, take on contracts, and shape the world around you.

Come try the Everpixel Tactics demo and see for yourself!

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoonish violence and gore and some swearing.

detailed_description:
Everpixel Tactics Demo

Everpixel Tactics is a turn-based, tactical, roguelike RPG set in a dynamic, procedurally-generated fantasy world. Lead a motley crew of mercenaries to greatness - or die trying. Hire samurai penguins, obese unicorns, or spell-flinging mages as you manage your company, take on contracts, and shape the world around you.

Come try the Everpixel Tactics demo and see for yourself!
name: Everpixel Tactics Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Everpixel Tactics is what happens when you combine tactical RPG, mercenaries, dinosaurs, and wiener dogs. Lead your motley crew of mercenaries to pixelated dominance in a dynamic, procedurally-generated world.
